lung.nodular_focus: 3 mm nodular focus at the right lung base suggests a nodular form of atelectasis that is unchanged since the remote prior examination.
lung.left_lobe_nodule: 3 mm nodule in the left lower lobe is also unchanged.
lung.posterior_lower_lobes: Patchy mosaic attenuation is not specific but could be seen with atelectasis and possibly coinciding air-trapping.

abdomen.kidneys: Right kidney is low-lying but appears normal; left kidney appears normal.

mesentery.finding: Persistent ill-defined soft tissue density in the left upper quadrant measuring about 25 x 14 mm.
mesentery.change: Has not really changed since remote prior CT.

abdomen.appendix: Dilated up to 15 mm with a fluid-filled lumen and hyperenhancement; no evidence for abscess or perforation.

bone.lesions: No suspicious lytic or blastic bone lesions.
bone.degenerative_changes: Moderate degenerative changes affecting lower lumbar facet joints especially at L3-L4 through L5-S1; mild spondylolisthesis of L4 and L5.
bone.canal_stenosis: Mild-to-moderate at L1-L2 but severe from L2-L3 through L4-L5.

changes_over_time.lung: No changes over time specified for the nodular focus at the right lung base and the left lower lobe nodule.
changes_over_time.mesentery: No changes over time specified for the soft tissue density.
changes_over_time.bone: Slight worsening of spinal stenosis over the long interval.
